name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki FC Evolution - Chara-Ani Limited Box
summary:
The CharaAni Limited Box includes:
• The game
• Everyone Assemble! Falcom Academy FC DVD
• Trails in the Sky FC genuine leather accessory case
• Sora no Kiseki First Chapter Evolution Archives (Estelle version)
• Sora no Kiseki First Chapter Evolution Archives (Joshua version)
• 5 rubber character straps for Estelle, Joshua, Tita, Agate, and Scherazard in the set
